website_summaries.verdict: This hoodie is available in many colors and boasts the unmatched quality of Under Armour, ensuring warmth, function, and comfort.
pros: Hoodie provides generous room and length to ensure that it’s suited for those of virtually any size
Feels thick and durable while also comfortable and soft
Features a convenient inner cell phone pocket
Boasts a lightweight feeling when worn
cons: Different colorways have a different fit

customer_reviews.title: Different colors fit differently - great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Did some spring cleaning, got rid of almost all My hoodies, found these on sale for 20-25.00 a pop and bought 4 different colors. Quality is great, feel is nice, comfortable, I am a big guy ordered a 3x to have extra room and it fit just right (not any extra room) in some colors, and somewhat small in some colors. I didn't find it to run very big like most reviews say. If anything it's a little bigger in the arms and a smidge long. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is 6'2" and 280 lb. I bought him the 2 XL it was a perfect fit and he told me several times that he loves this workout hoodie, and would like more like this one. I'm excited that it's great quality and that my husband is happy. I will buy this again in a different color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars I would. The emblem came off in the FIRST WASH. ....really? If I wanted a crappy sweater, I would have bought one at Target. I expected more from a $50+ sweater. DO NOT BUY THIS TRASH.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and looks great! There is a nice cell phone sized pocket within the large kangaroo pocket in front. A nice place to stash your cell phone without having to worry about it falling out of the larger, main pocket. The inner cell phone sized pocket is a little small, though. Fits my son's iPhone 8, but not my daughter's iPhone 8+.
customer_reviews.author: Good Bird

customer_reviews.title: fits great. i would say most likely will keep you ...
customer_reviews.text: fits great. i would say most likely will keep you warm in the high 30 temps but you must have winter coat over this! i am a huge under armour fan but they just dont make their clothes like they used when they revamp their whole line maybe about a year and half two years ago. but a great shirt and fits good. i am 5'8 150 and medium is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: everything about it was amazing - but peoples reviews stated that the sizes ran ...
customer_reviews.text: build quailty was exceptional, everything about it was amazing - but peoples reviews stated that the sizes ran big. I did not find this to be true
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get one already.
customer_reviews.text: I love UA products. They are far superior to Nike. UA doesn't make cheap products at all. I work outside and this hoodie is perfect for outdoor weather of all kinds. Just wear a long sleeve shirt underneath and you'll tolerate cold weather pretty nicely. Everyone freaks out when you show them the hydrophobic properties of the Hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: Flossie Dickey

customer_reviews.title: One of the items was sized incorrectly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 large black hoodies. One was black large-the other was navy and NOT large. I am keeping the smaller one for myself, but now must find a black large hoodie for my son. He is being deployed to Japan, so I will be forced to ship up to him long after. Christmas has passed. Just really frustrating! I will not use this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: rahnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hoody
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Under Armour hoodies. This is the third I've owned, and the best by far. The material is great; the interior is soft; and the stitch-work / design have improved in quality since the last hoody I got back in 2005. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Quat

customer_reviews.title: Just looks bad without the logo and instead an outline mark in ...
customer_reviews.text: One wash and the rubber UA logo fell off. Wouldnt be a big deal if there wasnt an outline left behind. Just looks bad without the logo and instead an outline mark in its place. I. Expected more for the price. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: R Vez

customer_reviews.title: Very warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a cross country hiking/camping trip that I just finished. It kept me warm in my sleeping bag even when the temperatures dipped below 18 degrees! It's not made for that but it helped a lot. I've never owned under armour gear before but plan to order a couple more to change out my Russell hoodies. The quality is outstanding and they are above all WARM.
customer_reviews.author: Survival Hiker

customer_reviews.title: It is not a soft cotton-y feel like some sweatshirts
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as a gift. It arrived on time and the color was as advertised. Fit was as expected for a large. It is not a soft cotton-y feel like some sweatshirts, more of a durable feel, though not abrasive or rough. It is insanely warm, likely due to the weave or the content blend of materials My husband occasionally has to take it off because it is so warm - but that is because my husband runs warm.I have borrowed it to wear when I was cold - and within 30 minutes I had to take it off because I was so hot. So, great for warming you up - possibly too good!
customer_reviews.author: Rodgers 5

customer_reviews.title: Blah color, but does it's job. Logo peels after one gentle wash.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but warm!!! Wish I'd gotten a different color. This one is a bit blah, but it does it's job, for sure! Unfortunately, after one cycle in the washer, with cold water and GENTLE CYCLE, the front logo is peeling off. This is totally unacceptable, considering what this gear costs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and performs well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and all you need on most winter days. With a shell over it I stay comfortable in subzero weather with wind running a snow blower for over an hour. Not water proof but highly water resistant. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DVVT

customer_reviews.title: Little long, but great sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a holiday present for my spouse. He is about 5'11 and a size large. It is very warm and nice quality. The only thing you may want to consider is this item is a little long. If you are a longer torso (taller guy), this is a great sweatshirt and will hit you in the right spot. It is a little long on him, but we are keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: CLT Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I love this hoodie. Finally UA has a hoodie that fits an athlete sized person. I am 6ft 9 and i wear a 39" sleeve. This hoodie has perfect length in the body and the sleeves are perfect length.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: Great  hoodie, will be good for fall and winter
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived this week, amazon had them marked down so I decided to grab. Really nice hoodie. I got the blue in a xl for my son who is 6ft tall and 215 pounds. Fits great but a little loose for him to grow as well. Its made of the sliky heavy material, not light weight at all. Will be great for this fall and winter.
customer_reviews.author: the mrs b

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good hoodie. Has been a favorite for a year. Nice and warm. No issue with the logo falling off either. I’ve washed and dried mine several times. It is a little bigger than expected though.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for really cold temps, wind and rain or snow.
customer_reviews.text: This top is good for about 32 degrees and colder on a sunny day. If you have wind and rain or snow, you’re probably good to about 40 degrees. It is very efficient at blocking the wind and light rain or snowfall. But on a sunny day, anything higher than low 30’s will find you sweating profusely. If you want a good, cold weather top, this absolutely does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this hoodie for a friend's birthday and they loved it. After the hoodie arrived so quick in ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hoodie for a friend's birthday and they loved it. After the hoodie arrived so quick in the mail, I really wanted one for myself since it had that nice, sporty breathable on the outside, and a super soft fleece material on the inside. Looked super warm and comfy! Would love to purchase another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Bougher

customer_reviews.title: Size and fitting & material.
customer_reviews.text: Aright, I’ve had this for awhile now. Still amazing fit & quality. I do wish the sleeves weren’t as wide since I don’t like to roll up sleeves to check my watch but the fit is good. Specially for guys who aren’t completely skinny lol, it’s got some room.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Bought this for my son as a last minute gift before Christmas because I saw it while scanning thru the daily deals. I was so excited about the deal I got for this sweatshirt, I was almost skeptical. It is perfect and my son loves it! THANK U AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I have never been disappointed with this product until now
customer_reviews.text: I have got a closet FULL of under armour stuff from dress shirts to T shirts to shoes and 20 or more hats. I have never been disappointed with this product until now. I ware a 2x and this was big enough to be a bath rob. and this stuff isn't cheap and I don't have the time to send it back. any knuckle draggers out there want to by a nice hoodie cheap?
customer_reviews.author: dean harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweatshirt. My husband is a tall, thinner, fit guy and finding clothes that fit him in a LT is really hard. This fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: bso04

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is a more than a whole size too small.
customer_reviews.author: David Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fit... Large is too small and extra large is way too big....come on UA!! It's not that hard.
customer_reviews.author: hh

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoodie but ordered a "tall" for someone who is ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice hoodie but ordered a "tall" for someone who is 6'4" and it was too long, order the regular size unless you're even taller than that
customer_reviews.author: amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: The real thing
customer_reviews.text: Genuine article. Great quality. Deliver slightly large. Shrank slightly after 1sr cold wash to be exactly true to size. Not baggy. Nice fit. Really warm!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: The hoodie itself is nice quality. But the under armour symbol on the front left chest, fell off already! And my husband just got it for xmas. After 1 time wearing it, the symbol was kind of starting to peel already. Now after I washed it the other day, the symbol is completely gone now. Not very happy especially since you pay more for the under armour symbol. And now it's just a basic plain hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: Seschumann

customer_reviews.title: Kudos UA!
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on Under Armour to give you a great product. You definitely get what you pay for they wash up great look great and definitely keep you warm without weighing you down. This is a very well-made hoodie and I look forward to wearing it during the cold winter days
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Logo on sweatshirt will peel off
customer_reviews.text: Sweatshirt is great but it has a rubber logo on the front and it has started peeling off. If I wasn't 2 weeks outside of the return window I would return it for sure! Just embroider your logo under armor!
customer_reviews.author: DKlein

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable workout sweatshirts I have ever worn. Check if it’s on sale though! Tad overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Wesley Opoien

customer_reviews.title: Great tops
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly like every other under armour. Very true to size. Hubby loves these. Slightly too expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a true size!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the L size but the it is not a standard L size. It is too big. The product quality is good but the size is not a standard size . So, it is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great Hoodie. I am 6'5" and this Large-Tall was absolutely perfect. I have a slight gut and it was not "tight" or uncomfortable what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Beach

customer_reviews.title: Love this hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying under armour for a long time and they still have yet to let me down. This hoodie is really warm and perfect fit for my size.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell817

customer_reviews.title: Looking good!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandson. He ♥️ it! Excellent quality & pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Else A.

customer_reviews.title: It is slightly form fitting though and the sleeves do not roll up easily. I would recommend buying a size larger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm hoodie made of quality materials. It is slightly form fitting though and the sleeves do not roll up easily. I would recommend buying a size larger than your shirt size
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love the materials feel. It's very comfortable to wear around the house and it's warm out in the elements. This with my under armour compression thermal and I really don't need a coat.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: Knock off. Not under armor quality. The rubber x fell off right away. Not water resistant coating either. Probably from China
customer_reviews.author: Brett Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sweatshirt. Runs very long in torso and arms
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sweatshirt. Runs very long in torso and arms. Fit my 6'3" son perfectly, but the 5' 8" son was swimming in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the xlt I should have got the xl but I still wear it
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit long
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and very comfortable. I normally buy size large tops, but this one runs a bit long and baggy (which I am fine with). Knowing this now, I probably could have gotten a medium.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for my husband and he loves it. Fits to size. Has some stretch but not very much. Keeps the warmth in well for a sweater.
customer_reviews.author: Nocturna bird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these hoodies! Very comfortable and warm. Will definitely splurge and get more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits according to size and looks just like the picture. We were definitely satisfied and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine odonnell

customer_reviews.title: Best cold weather hoodie ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best hoodie, for cold weather, I have ever bought!!!!! They shouldn’t have stopped making them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: Fits well my boyfriend wears it all the time it's super soft
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Got this in a 3xl fits perfect by far my favorite sweatshirt
customer_reviews.author: punter27gsc

customer_reviews.title: flawed merchandise makes me feel a little bit cheated
customer_reviews.text: the hoodie is great and it is one of my favorite winters wear. unfortunately one of the
customer_reviews.author: nimrod

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: *WARM* hoodie. My husband said he put it on and immediately felt warm-- even went outside for a walk at 40 degrees without an issue. We ordered him a tall due to his height and I was surprised at how long it was.. almost too long. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality true to size
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES!! Size was true to size. Color we got is the dark green and it's awesome. Can't go wrong with UA. Very comfortable and awesome material
customer_reviews.author: KaiT CTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: The color and style was great. Way small
customer_reviews.text: The color and style was great. Way small. A man's large was equivalent to a med/small in almost any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Underarmor never seems to disappoint. Got on sale at a great price and love it
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Runs Larger Than Sizing Chart Says
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart said I was a large and when it showed up, it was much too big. The quality was outstanding though, so just keep the sizing in mind.
customer_reviews.author: JD119

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm!
customer_reviews.text: The medium is perfect for our 12 year old son. This has held up for tons of washings and is warm enough to wear as a coat when he's waiting for the bus. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. It is good quality and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: jak2008

customer_reviews.title: Fine Hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, quality hoodie! I like the material which is supposed to be water resistant. I didn't realize that when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: ncpapa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fleece hoodie. Very warm for those cold Ohio winter days. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Provides warmth without too much weight
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Provides warmth without too much weight, is fairly easy to take on & off, and is comfortable. The best part however, is the Storm repellent finish on the outside. I've never had a hoodie that I actually trust in light rain/mildly wet conditions. A nice added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Great Job
customer_reviews.text: Great sweatshirt! Good quality and it just looks good! Fits perfectly. I would buy this sweatshirt again. Thank you Under Armour
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Camany

customer_reviews.title: Schnazzy. It has an extra pocket in the pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: Schnazzy. It has an extra pocket in the pocket where you can hide yer weed.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is tall for his age and the youth ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is tall for his age and the youth XL was not long enough. Even though this hoodie is a little big and long, it is true to size for an adult small.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit. Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit. Excellent Quality. Ordered a Small in the color black for my 15 year old and it fits as expected. UA quality of clothing is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MOMOM

customer_reviews.title: Nice sweatshirt. The reviews were right it does seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sweatshirt. The reviews were right it does seem to run large. I usually or xl but upon reading the reviews I ordered a lg. It fit great.
customer_reviews.author: J.H.

customer_reviews.title: and it is very comfortable. He practically lives in it now/
customer_reviews.text: It can be difficult to find 3XL anything for my husband. He loves this hoodie, and it is very comfortable. He practically lives in it now/
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and very comfortable. Way too big though. I wear a large and this large fit like an extra large
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality unsure if it is authentic
customer_reviews.text: Under armour emblem came off after first wash. Unsure if it is authentic. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good athletic look
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loves it! It's a little long, but that's how it's supposed to fit. Good athletic look.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m truly satisfied with this purchase. It came EXACTLY as advertised. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hoodie. Wish they were cheaper I’d buy 20. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well fitted.
customer_reviews.text: It's Under Armor, and it lives up to the name. Comfortable, tough, and stylish. Winner, winner!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on under armour to be top quality wear. Wash/dries without shrinking or pilling. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: K Mc

customer_reviews.title: My go-to hoodie when it's cold a good amount of people I know will throw on jackets
customer_reviews.text: My go-to hoodie when it's cold a good amount of people I know will throw on jackets, gloves, scarfs, hats to stay warm but I just throw on this hoodie and I'm good to go always keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great~ 3x fits like a 3x should. If you are unsure go size down unless you like it baggy.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Lover

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with good stitching. Works well on a chilly day.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Bear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hoodie. Really repels water good. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweater. My Husband likes the feel of the material. the size fit just right, and its a bit longer than similar sweaters in this size, he loves that because hes tall and this really covers comfortably for his length. No problems with packaging or shipping, item was well wrapped and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica P Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It hasn't gotten cold her yet but the price was right and my husband is very impressed with the hoodie
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these straight bottom hoodies. For a bigger guy, they sort of look slimming...
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: looks so much better in person
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous green color, looks so much better in person. My dad loved it, fit just as expected. He's 5'11,185lbs, athletic build.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft inside. Bought this for my husband 6'2" fit is great. Not too short like the regular fit we bought the 2xl Tall. Great quality. True in color. Not too fitted. Warm for exercise in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: R L G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A big UA fan and this is another great buy
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love under armour hoodies. They are very well made and simply the best.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stein

customer_reviews.title: But with that in mind it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have to buy all my under armour close one size bigger than normal. But with that in mind it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy-Fur

customer_reviews.title: Great Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved his hoodie. Under Armour always carries its name.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my nephew for Christmas and he loves it. He'll only wear Under Armor.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Dedrick

customer_reviews.title: Love everything UA
customer_reviews.text: Love everything UA, can't get enough. My closet is full of this stuff. From socks to to underwear to hoodies. Havent found anything from UA I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the red one for my husband as a Christmas gift and he loves the fit as well as it being waterproof. The color looks great on his tan-ish skin and has become his go to hoodie! Will buy more in the future 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Delagarza

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Was too big. Sleeves did not have the elastic at the wrists that I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick27

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Grandson is extremely happy with it. It washes nice and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Danalynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift for my brother, he wears it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits loosely but very comfortable and warm and okay at stopping wind.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son he works outside, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great but.....
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it does run slightly on the larger side. Size small fits almost like a medium
customer_reviews.author: Israel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing hoodie. Keeps the water off and is breathable! I would recommend it to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking durable sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this sweatshirt. It fits great, and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: demille1

customer_reviews.title: UA Never Disappoints
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and looks good. I’ll be wearing this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for my brother-in-law for Christmas - he was was happy with the fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother-in-law for Christmas - he was was happy with the fit. This was his first Under Armour sweatshirt and will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Novakowski

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Washed over & over & still looks ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Washed over & over & still looks brand new. My 13 yr old son wears it daily over shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Storm Armour Fleece Hoodie
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology repels water without sacrificing breathability . Armour Fleece is light, breathable & stretches for superior mobility . Soft inner layer traps heat to keep you warm & comfortable . Hand pockets with right-side internal phone pocket.
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology repels water without sacrificing breathability
Armour Fleece is light, breathable & stretches for superior mobility
Soft inner layer traps heat to keep you warm & comfortable
Hand pockets with right side internal phone pocket
